description.@en: Some say that Halflings are watched over by Abyssal demons. Those with this affectation are oftentimes shadowed by a black cat or have it as a beloved pet, ‘found ’ at their doorstep as a kitten.

effect.@en: Whenever you fall, you may spend one Fortune Point to avoid Damage. In this case, you land on your feet, apparently unharmed. You can learn more about falling in Chapter 9: Hazards & Healing.
